page.title: 14Penmount Crematorium
page.content:
There are now two chapels at the {Crematorium,}allowing two services to take place simultaneously. There's a rota of local{religious ministers}to take services if required. Some people prefer their own church ministers.
The{cost of cremation}is Â£60 per corpse, 15-20% of the total funeral costs. Plants can be placed in the Garden of Remembrance with a memorial plaque of the deceased, at a cost of Â£75 (for 20 years).
The Superintendent is in charge and has{3}clerical and{4}manual staff. There are also{6}full time gardeners and an additional{2}taken on for the summer months.
A new{Garden of Remembrance}has recently been opened.
